Verses: 1 karththaave, Ummudaiya Kobaththile Ennaik Kadindhukollaadheyum, Ummudaiya Ukkiraththile Ennaith Dhandiyaadheyum.
2 enmel Irakkamaayirum Karththaave, Naan Belanatrupponen; Ennaik Gunamaakkum Karththaave, En Elumbugal Nadungugiradhu.
3 en Aaththumaa Migavum Viyaagulappadugiradhu; Karththaave, Edhuvaraikkum Irangaadhiruppeer.
4 thirumbum Karththaave, En Aaththumaavai Viduviyum; Ummudaiya Kirubaiyinimiththam Ennai Ratchiyum.
5 maranaththil Ummai Ninaivukoorvadhillai, Paadhaalaththil Ummaith Thudhippavan Yaar?
6 en Perumoochchinaal Ilaiththupponen; Raamuzhuvadhum En Kanneeraal En Padukkaiyai Migavum Eeramaakki, En Kattilai Nanaikkiren.
7 thuyaraththinaal En Kangal Kuzhivizhundhupoyitru; En Saththurukkal Anaivarnimiththamum Mangippoyitru.
8 akkiramakkaarare, Neengal Ellaarum Ennaivittu Agandrupongal; Karththar En Azhugaiyin Saththaththaik Kettaar.
9 karththar En Vinnappaththaik Kettaar; Karththar En Jebaththai Etrukkolluvaar.
10 en Pagaignar Ellaarum Vetki Migavum Kalangippovaargal; Avargal Pinnaagath Thirumbi Sadidhiyile Vetkappaduvaargal.
